oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Photomontage of babies and children, two group pictures of men who did not get in car accidents, and an ad. Nashville Banner, 1927 April 3.

oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Photomontage of babies and children, two group pictures of men who did not get in car accidents (recognized by the Nashville Railway & Light Company), and an ad. 16 x 21.5 in. Forms part of the Nashville Newspaper Rotogravure Digital Images Collection.
